channel.title: 562 commands help
channel.description:
Daniel says: *lol. *can u post a thread on mopar scape? Andrew says: *for? Daniel says: *ok, so my question is:
[code=text]How would I add a ::item (item code) (amount) command?
I know I have to add it somewhere in CommandsPackethandler.java .. but i have no idea where/how.
Help please.
don't flame, I'm only trying to learn. [/code] *basicly that^ *with saying it's a 562.

item.title: 562 commands help
item.dc:creator: @Mendorphins Mendorphins
item.description:
@Mendorphins wrote:

You could download a source that has one and rip it from there, making the necessary adjustments to your source.

Read full topic
